content:
[Chritsmas] 

Family member: So Troy I bought a new stock I want to know what you think?

Me: Oh nice, what is it?

FM: Beyond Meat

Me: 

FM: it’s really gone down recently thought it might be a good value

Me: *in my head* “value” 

Me: proceeds to go into 30 min soliloquy

@Hardees is going beyond with their new plant-based menu. They’re offering 4 new Beyond Meat menu items starting 12/30. 

Will you give them a try? 👀 https://t.co/pBELQOHpoh
@BeyondMeat Because of this add on @twitter I will buy this product.
THEY HAVE BEYOND MEAT!!!! IM GOING FERAL
Beyond Meat Pie for dinner 🧹 Promptly after gym. If I make him wait he’s a complete d*ck.

Then you let the cream cheese marry the broth & Mushrooms. Viola 😘 BeyondMeat / #BeyondMeatballs 
Also we need an animation person & cinematography
I took my Destin hoodie off when the twin waitresses offered complimentary queso while we waited on la dinner. #BeyondMeat
Reminds me I’m out of it rn. Beyond Meat 🥧
Tried the new Beyond Meat sandwich this morning at Dunkin’ Donuts 😋 Brought my own vegan cheese 😃 #beyondmeat #vegan #vegansofig #veganfoodshare #vegandunkindonuts @ Dunkin' https://t.co/5lqt0AmbEG
All I have to work w is Morning Star. Had to add artificial chorizo to give it flavor like Beyond Meat. 🥧 The parentals are having Johnny Marzetti. Followed by KFC
Tonight is Beyond Meat 🥧 They probably won’t eat that.
@BeyondMeat @dunkindonuts @gwils_17 famous!

I said nope. We’re dancing tonight and I’ve already been to #Publix 😉

Tonight's Menu⁣

So...I'm a day late on taco day, but whatever...⁣

The apex is I’ve never milked a cow before. But I was very Charlottes Web and cried and begged for the adults not to kill the animals 🌽 
Btw, #Quorn is just as good as #BeyondMeat

I’m considering a tennis skirt throwback today while making meat pie 🥧 We call it that. It’s actually #BeyondMeat but we can’t taste the difference. I don’t remember the last time. The ability of mind over matter is #magnetic 🧲
I mean , I can try them w #BeyondMeat. We just need a substance to make them hold together. Like Balls 😃
If #BeyondMeat made meatballs we’d get them. I’m having to use a crockpot so I don’t touch the real thing
Maybe the #BeyondMeat gang could whip something up. I actually like it better than the real thing. Routine blood work is better than ever too so no one can say it isn’t nutritious

Orecchiette w/ Italian turkey sausage and broccoli 🇮🇹. ⁣
